thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Michael Williams
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Michael Williams

author: Michael Williams
title: Michael Williams
text: Purchased 2 shower filters, received promptly installed easily and are working nicely. Already notice softer hair and my skin doesn't itch like it used to. I live on L.I. NY and the water is notoriously bad. Only negative filter points upward and others are designed to hang down, would be nice to have the option depending on the amount of space you have above. One of mine was a tight squeeze.
